item.title: Quest interface? O.o
item.dc:creator: @Demon6994 Demon6994
item.description:
@Demon6994 wrote:

Alright. Well you know how when you’re on runescape or something, you go to the quest tab and an interface comes up?
Well what i’m trying to do is, I want to make a command so that when it’s typed, an interface will come up with the text inside it…
But the question is, how would I make this so an interface will come up, without it being in the quest tab…? Where the command opens an interface instead of having it so it goes…

c.sendmessage(“Message here”);

over and over so it’s all in ONE big interface without it cluttering the chatbox.

Read full topic
